Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Granville
ShortDescription: #49B North Western buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Western, Peterson California, Devon and Western, due to police activity near Western/Granville

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49B North Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Peterson California, Devon and Western, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Western/Granville.

Allow extra travel time.
